title: Impress the Murder Tribunal
content:
und the Temple of Bhaal, and have entered - ready to reclaim the Bhaalspawn birthright.

Impress the Murder Tribunal Walkthrough

You can reach Murder Tribunal from Canduhallow's Tombstones. Remove the Painting called Butterfly on Skull, press the button to reveal the entrance.

How to unlock Impress the Murder Tribunal
